issue.title: Image Solution runs with catkin setup but not using docker compose

content.raw:
Hi @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , 

I am still having the same issues. Is there a way to give the solution image permission to use cuda? My image has cuda enabled as I am able to compile it but when I run it on the ./run\_docker\_compose.sh is gives me the error that there are no cuda enabled devices. 

‌

‌
content.html:
Hi @Alfredo Bencomo ,

I am still having the same issues. Is there a way to give the solution image permission to use cuda? My image has cuda enabled as I am able to compile it but when I run it on the ./run_docker_compose.sh is gives me the error that there are no cuda enabled devices.

‌
